text: Transferring data from your SaaS applications
to make it available for integration
and analysis should be easy,
but it's often a distraction that steals resources
away from other projects that maximize business value.
Amazon AppFlow enables you to securely transfer data
between SaaS applications and AWS services.
And now,
it supports over 50 SaaS application data sources.
You can securely move data from CRM and ERP applications
like Salesforce or SAP,
and Marketing applications like Facebook Ads and Google Ads,
to AWS destinations such as Amazon S3 or Amazon Redshift.
Get started in just a few clicks and use features
like automated scheduling, transformations like filtering,
masking, and validation, and network connection retries
without needing to write any code.
Accelerate analysis and machine learning
with automated preparation and registration of your schema
into the Glue Data Catalog where it can be discovered
and shared with AWS analytics and machine learning services.
Get massive data scale with up to 100 GB per flow,
allowing you to transfer millions of data records at once.
And all the data running through Amazon AppFlow
is encrypted at rest and in transit.
Securely transfer and integrate your data today
with Amazon AppFlow.
